title: Ranged magic

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ranged magic (also known as ranged-based magic) attacks are distinguished by a unique set of characteristics.

content:
Ranged magic (also known as ranged-based magic) attacks are distinguished by a unique set of characteristics.

Protection: Prayer method Defence and armour method
Attack acts like Magic → Protect from Magic Ranged → Defend against ranged, with e.g., Bandos, Barrows ()

List of monsters that use ranged magic[edit | edit source]

  • Kree'arra
  • Spinolyp
  • Torcher

Note: The monsters above are present in constant-combat environments in which you will also be taking other forms of damage (melee, ranged, traditional magic) - decide on equipment accordingly.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Magical ranged
  • Magical melee
rawContent:
'''Ranged magic''' (also known as '''ranged-based magic''') attacks are distinguished by a unique set of characteristics.

{| class="wikitable"
|'''<u>Protection:</u>'''
|'''Prayer method [[File:Prayer icon.png]]'''
|'''Defence and armour method [[File:Defence icon.png]]'''
|-
|'''Attack acts like'''
|Magic [[File:Magic icon.png]] → [[Protect from Magic]]
|Ranged [[File:Ranged icon.png]] → Defend against ranged, with e.g., [[Bandos armour|Bandos]], [[Barrows equipment|Barrows]] ([[File:Bandos chestplate.png]][[File:Torag's platebody.png]])
|}

==List of monsters that use ranged magic==
*[[Kree'arra]]
*[[Spinolyp]]
*[[Torcher]]

''Note:'' The monsters above are present in constant-combat environments in which you will also be taking other forms of damage (melee, ranged, traditional magic) - decide on equipment accordingly.

==See also==
*[[Magical ranged]]
*[[Magical melee]]

[[Category:Defence]]
[[Category:Mechanics]]
